summary: A set of generic helper utilities used by the marshmallow library to handle common tasks such as missing-value sentinel handling, type and collection checks, date/time parsing and formatting, timezone handling, and simple value accessors.
business_intent: Provide reusable low‑level functions that support marshmallow's schema validation and (de)serialization processes, enabling consistent handling of timestamps, ISO strings, collections, and other data‑type concerns across the library.
